thread.title: Sunday penalty rates weekend cut business reacts | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Sunday penalty rates weekend cut business reacts | Daily Mail Online

author: Sinead Maclaughlin For Daily Mail Australia
title: Sunday penalty rates weekend cut business reacts | Daily Mail Online
text: The cafe bosses, the worker and the customer who's set to benefit: One small business reacts to the shock penalty rate cuts - and their views may surprise you Sydney business owner slams Fair Work Commission verdict to cut penalty rates Sunday and public holiday penalty rates for hospitality workers will be slashed More than 700,000 retail, hospitality and fast-food workers will be affected Square Sandwiches' co-owners say workers need incentives for unsocial hours Worker Maggie Kowalka said she 'didn't know' what the future holds after cuts Consumer Elizabeth Woods says the decision might benefit customer service
